name: Pirateland (itch)
description:
This game is still in development, and because of that, you will likely experience some bugs while you are playing. This is a game done for a university project, we are releasing this alpha version now, despite this.

We will continue to develop the game, adding new content, new game modes and new worlds. A multiplayer mode is also in our plans. Stay tuned!

You can check our Instagram for future updates: @fivemost

Hope you enjoy anyway!
